thread.title: BRIEF-Digi International To Eliminate About 60 Employment Positions

title: BRIEF-Digi International To Eliminate About 60 Employment Positions
text:
April 4, 2018 / 6:23 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago BRIEF-Digi International To Eliminate About 60 Employment Positions Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - Digi International Inc: 
* DIGI INTERNATIONAL SAYS ANNOUNCED RESTRUCTURING PLAN ON APRIL 2 UNDER WHICH CO TO ELIMINATE ABOUT 60 EMPLOYMENT POSITIONS - SEC FILING 
* THE 60 EMPLOYMENT POSITIONS TO BE ELIMINATED SPAN CURRENT FISCAL QUARTER ENDING JUNE 30 AND SUBSEQUENT FISCAL QUARTER ENDING SEPT. 30 
* RESTRUCTURING PLAN EXPECTED TO RESULT IN TOTAL ANNUALIZED SAVINGS OF ABOUT $3 MILLION TO $5 MILLION 
* AS PER RESTRUCTURING PLAN, CO TO TRANSFER ITS EDEN PRAIRIE OPERATIONS MANUFACTURING FUNCTIONS TO EXISTING CONTRACT MANUFACTURE SUPPLIERS Source text: ( bit.ly/2H8TEcR ) Further company coverage:
